page.title: 05THE BRYAN FAMILY'S YEAR.
page.content: Dad,Mum,Helen(l3),Alison(9).{July {August}2 weeks camping in France {September}Mum's birthday,changed l6 year old car for 8 year old car {October}Half term spent in Northumberland looking at Hadrians Wall.{November}Guy Fawkes Night at Rugby Club,bonfire and fireworks. Dad & my birthdays went to theatre to see Joseph & his Technicoloured Dream- coat{December}7 visitors for Christmas Opened presents from under tree on Christmas morning{January}New Year Dad first-footed with piece of coal.Friend whose father working on Falklands airport came to stay{February}Dad had car crash into wall{March}Mothering Sunday Mum had chocolates and break- fast in bed{April}Easter at Nans,found 7 eggs hidden in house{May}I had rabbit and Helen guineapig for pets {June}Helen's birthday saw Guys & Dolls
